name: La Siesta Premium Saigon
address: 182 Lý Tự Trọng, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
description:
La Siesta Premium Saigon có hồ bơi ngoài trời, trung tâm thể dục, khu vườn và sân hiên ở TP. Hồ Chí Minh. Chỗ nghỉ này có các tiện nghi như nhà hàng và quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Các căn tại khách sạn được trang bị điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình cáp, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. Các phòng đều có ấm đun nước, trong đó một số phòng có ban công và một số khác thì nhìn ra thành phố. Tại La Siesta Premium Saigon, các phòng đều đi kèm với ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Hằng ngày, chỗ nghỉ có các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu Á cho bữa sáng.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, khách sạn 5 sao này có dịch vụ thuê xe đạp.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Chợ Bến Thành, Bảo tàng Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh và Trung tâm mua sắm Takashimaya Việt Nam. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Tân Sơn Nhất, cách La Siesta Premium Saigon 7 km.

review.comment_positive: Fabulous location, facilities and excellent service. Love the attention to details - welcoming drink and departing gift. Staff go out of their way to ensure everything you need is attended to. Have stayed in many places in Saigon and cannot recommend this hotel more highly. Won’t stay anywhere else in the future.

review.rating: Extremely warm service staff & the best location
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The property was in an excellent location, the amenities were complete, rooms were clean and the bed was extremely comfortable! Only had 1 chair in the room, but when I asked the front desk for it, they promptly sent an additional one up! The services were excellent, all the staff of La Siesta looked genuinely happy to see us every time and we felt very at home and at ease wherever we entered the hotel. They even prepared a birthday surprise for my cousin on the last day of our breakfast! Truly extraordinary service. Place was also walkable to Ben Thanh market and other areas of interest. Lots of food options all around
review.comment_negative: It would have been nice to have a bathtub in the room, and also the room had this slight drainage smell the moment you enter room but is unnoticeable after the 1st 2-3 mins.

review.comment_positive: The property is very luxurious and comfortable. They have done a lovely job furnishing the rooms. The staff are wonderful too.
review.comment_negative: It’s a new hotel and there were a few details that weren’t up to standard. Our bathroom had a really bad smell and it needed to have air conditioning and a humidifier in there. There was very little storage space to unpack your bag and details like hooks in the bathroom hadn’t been very well thought out. A very very beautiful stay don’t get me wrong, but for 5 stars and this price there were a couple of things that could be improved.

Thank you La Siesta for a wonderful stay! Will definitely return if the opportunity arises!

review.rating: An excellent modern hotel close to places of interest in District 1.
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
A new modern hotel in an excellent location, District 1, close to places of interest. 
Our bedroom was large, it had a king size bed and a great walk in shower. It was clean and comfortable. The staff were very friendly and couldn’t do enough for you.
The roof top bar has a great view over the city and was a nice place to have a drink in the evening. The hotel’s restaurant was excellent.
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast was okay but there could have been more choice. The selection of hot food was limited.
The swimming pool is small and is located next to the dining room window! It does have a few sun beds along one side but it is not a very inviting area to relax in.

review.comment_negative: Nuestro vuelo salía muy temprano y tuvimos que pedir un desayuno para llevar. El contenido de la caja era un sándwich con el pan seco y una loncha de jamón, una manzana y un yogur. Tienen que pensar que ese desayuno también lo hemos pagado. Muy mal.

review.rating: A delightful stay in a beautiful hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: La Siesta is in an excellent location - walking distance to so many of the major sights in Saigon. The hotel is beautifully maintained and the staff go above and beyond to assist with anything you may require. The facilities are excellent - the pool and roof top bar add to the ambience of this lovely hotel. Rooms are spotlessly clean. Breakfast has a great variety of food and is plentiful. Overall a wonderful stay and I would highly recommend. Thank you to all of the amazing staff from reception to the restaurant and pool area. You are all a credit to this amazing hotel.

review.comment_positive: スタッフの印象がとてもよかったです。皆さんいつも笑顔で接してくださいました。部屋も掃除が行き届いていて、気持ちよく過ごせました。夜中、外の音やほかの部屋の声など気にならなかったので、特に壁が薄いということはなかったと思います。エレベーターの近くの部屋でしたが、全然音が聞こえませんでした。
review.comment_negative: シャワー室の排水に関して、シャワーの水がなかなか引かなかった（流れなかった）。排水口の掃除をしていないのか、ベトナムあるあるなのか、謎です。ほかに問題がなかっただけに、とても残念な点です。

review.comment_positive: We stayed here for 5 nights and found La Siesta Premium to be the perfect hotel with great customer service. The service from the moment we arrived through our departure was wonderful. The staff were excellent, super helpful and polite. The hotel has a great location, located in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City in District 1 and close to the markets, various historical sites, and restaurants. They have a beautiful rooftop bar with city views and their spa is to die for, it was excellent! I highly recommend this hotel!

review.rating: Overall, the Hotel was exceptional. The staff went above and beyond, the rooms were comfortable and well-maintained, the
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Hotel and I must say, the staff exceeded my expectations. From the moment I arrived, they greeted me with warmth and professionalism, ensuring that all my needs were met throughout my stay. Their friendly and attentive service truly made me feel welcomed and valued as a guest.

The rooms at La Siesta Hotel were fantastic. They were spacious, well-appointed, and impeccably clean. The comfortable beds and plush linens made for a restful sleep, while the modern amenities provided everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The attention to detail in room design and upkeep was evident and greatly appreciated.

The hotel's facilities were top-notch. The fitness center was well-equipped, allowing me to maintain my workout routine. The swimming pool provided a refreshing escape from the city heat, and the spa offered a range of rejuvenating treatments that left me feeling pampered and relaxed. The hotel's attention to providing a variety of amenities ensured there was something for everyone to enjoy.

Now, let's talk about the food. The hotel's dining options were simply outstanding. The on-site restaurant offered a diverse menu featuring both local and international cuisines. Each dish was expertly prepared, bursting with flavors and beautifully presented. The attentive and knowledgeable staff made dining a truly memorable experience.

review.rating: Wish I booked more nights here!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King (Không có Cửa sổ)
review.comment_positive:
Everything, from the very start, the communication was perfect. I was welcomed by the team upon arrival, and not a finger was lifted with my lugged from there. 
I was greeted with the most lavish welcome drink I’ve had yet, while taking in the stunning lobby. 
The room had all the comforts you could think of and was personalised, you didn’t feel like just any other guest. The most comfortable bed followed by a pillow menu sent you into perfect slumber.
The restaurant for dinner (note: there was also a vegan menu) was lux, had everything you would expect from a menu in a place like this and the staff went above and beyond. I attended the breakfast and that was 10/10, wow!  
The pool and the view, was stunning and perfectly located on the property, and I booked a facial at the spa, the service was the highlight of my trip. I didn’t get time to look at the gym or other areas in the hotel, I should have stayed longer! 
The staff went above and beyond when I was leaving and my driver had an issue with his car, they swiftly took care of it and arranged an alternative- all which they informed me once it was already here so I didn’t have a moment of stress!
I cannot recommend staying at La Seista highly enough!

We stayed here for our honeymoon and the first few nights in Ho Chi Minh City. What a start! I was blown away by the facilities and staff! 

The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive. Special mention to Trinh, Dat and Liem who made our experience even better. They helped us with tours, gave us recommendations and seeing the city and just made us feel welcome. 

Hotel provided complementary bottled water. The iced Vietnamese coffee was delicious. The breakfast had numerous options and the pho was delicious. 

The rooftop pool was perfect after a day of exploring. 

The room was spacious and clean. The bed was comfy. 

If you want luxury and a perfect experience, then this hotel is for you.

The SPA in the hotel, hands down the best massage/spa service I ever tried. Highly recommend getting the SPA packages. I took the Blissful 4 hour package which includes sauna, foot care, massage, massage, body scrub and beauty treatment. Plus snacks and light lunch. You can customize it.

The check-in process felt personal and welcoming. Definitely better than your standard hotel check ins.

review.comment_positive:
Fantàstic hotel!!! Havien obert feia poc i realment es notava perquè tot era nou, net i cuidat, i tenia molt d’encant. A més és un hotel molt cèntric. 
L’habitació molt acollidora i els espais immillorables, sobretot la piscina al terrat. L’esmorzar també molt bó i variat. 
Però sobretot destacar el personal que era molt atent i amable. Gràcies a tot el staff i en especial a la Ha Nguyen que fins i tot ens va resoldre un tema dels vols a Da Nang trucant a la companyia. Hotel molt recomanable!!! I gràcies a aquesta experiència al continuar el viatge per Vietnam vem anar a altres hotels de la cadena Siesta tot i que només a menjar ja que teníem el viatge planificat i realment no van defraudar en especial el La Siesta Premium Hang Be Hotel de Hanoi amb un gran restaurant al terrat i bones vistes.

review.comment_positive: Staying at La Siesta Premium in Ho Chi Minh City was an absolute pleasure! The service at La Siesta Premium was top-notch, with every staff member displaying warmth and professionalism. Communication was a breeze thanks to their impeccable English proficiency, making us feel right at home. Their recommendations for local attractions, dining, and activities were invaluable, allowing us to make the most of our time in the city. Not only was the service outstanding, but it was also truly remarkable. Their attention to detail and dedication to guest satisfaction are unparalleled. From check-in to check-out, every interaction was met with genuine warmth and expertise. Highly recommended.

We will definitely stay here again if we come back to Saigon.

review.rating: Stop looking around, just book this. You won’t be disappointed.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic hotel at a great central location in Saigon. The service of the staff was exceptional. Rooms are clean and spacious, very quiet at night even though the hotel is so central.
Amazing breakfast with everything you could wish for. Lovely pool with nice views over the rooftops of Saigon. Very clean and not very busy most of the time.
The rooftop bar is an absolute highlight, with tasty cocktails and a very elegant setting.
The location is in walking distance to street markets and many good restaurants, very central in the city.
We had to leave early in the morning to catch our flight and the hotel provided us with a little breakfast box to take to the airport - delicious and just showing the top notch service this hotel provides!
Would highly recommend staying here and definitely come back in the future!
review.comment_negative: Gym was a bit warm until the air con got going - that’s all!

All of the hotel staff were so welcoming and friendly and they really made our short stay memorable. Oh and that cucumber arrival drink was so good we wanted more!

review.comment_positive: スタッフの方々全員がプロフェッショナル、かつフレンドリーで愛らしい方ばかりでした。ホテルも清潔でおしゃれでした。明るく気持ちの良い空間で提供される朝ご飯も、毎日豪華で本当に美味しかったです。お名前を伺えませんでしたが、チェックアウト時にいらっしゃった女性の責任者の方は、下手な英語で無理な相談をしたにも関わらず、嫌な顔一つせず解決してくださり、分かりやすい英語でたくさん話しかけてくださり、最後には嬉しいお心遣いまでしてくださいました。本当にとても素敵な方で、夫婦共々ファンになりタクシーの中では女性スタッフの方の話で持ちきりでした。ホーチミンにまた訪れる際にはまたこのホテルにお世話になりたいです。ありがとうございました！

review.comment_positive: This is a gorgeous hotel! It was the best we could find in Ho Chi Minh (there are some weird reviews out there!). The facilities are absolutely stunning. The rooms are small but they’re lovely and very clean. The hotel give you a personal concierge who can help you with bookings/suggestions during your time in Saigon. Liem looked after us and he was absolutely excellent! He couldn’t do enough for us.
review.comment_negative:
This is no big deal but the elevators are so slow when it’s busy - there are only two that service the whole hotel (which has a lot of rooms). 

We also found it intimidating how many staff were standing behind reception at all times (not doing anything just congregating), when we had a query we felt like we were asking 8 people. Again it’s no big deal but it’s something I haven’t experienced in many hotels and found a little weird and intimidating.

review.comment_positive: Uno de los mejores hoteles donde he estado. Me gustó todo: el hotel y habitación mejor que en las fotos, la piscina con vistas maravillosas y agua templada, los masajes increíbles, el desayuno buffet con un menú fabuloso,  la cena, la ubicación...y sobre todo el personal: Thi, Thoa, Thao y el resto, encantadores y eficientes sin agobiar.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
La Siesta had amazing service and was extremely clean.

From the time you check in and time you leave, the service had been exceptional. I can't seem to stop thanking the staff for all the travel tips and help booking in my other activities during my stay.

From welcome drinks to late evening tea provided to my room, my stay had been soo good I had stayed in my room more when free.

Each room was kept clean and the beds were very comfortable, internet was fast and each room had a smart TV.

The pool is located on the top floor with easy access to towels and bathrooms.

The included breakfast had special dishes but the food had lot of western influenced dishes.

Very continental type of breakfast but with some special dishes that makes its good overall.
Pho and vietnamese coffee was very delicious and would recommend both chicken and beef pho.

Other dishes are very common for a continental buffet, breakfast service was also amazing. Special dishes start serving as 630am but breakfast bar opens at 6am (special as in place order dishes such as omelette,pho, made to order eggs)* all included

Bathrooms had included everything from soap, shampoo and conditioner.
Shaving kits - yes
Dental- Yes

Each room had tea,coffee, kettle. 
Mini bar fridge included mini bar items for sale and hard to fit extra drinks or takway.

No microwave. 

Overall 5/5. The staff and people make the place extra special.
review.comment_negative:
No utensils in rooms, hard to eat and clean take away
(rooms not designed to have large amounts of away)
Mini bar fridge didn't have much space to keep my drinks or cold take away.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
La struttura si trova in una posizione centrale, comoda per raggiungere tutti i principali siti di interesse a piedi.
Le camere sono pulite e confortevoli, materasso comodissimo per un riposo senza eguali e possibilità di scegliere il cuscino tra varie tipologie.
Colazione abbondante e varia.
Dopo una lunga giornata in giro per la città abbiamo apprezzato tantissimo la piscina a sfioro.
Personale sempre attento e molto cordiale.

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Neuwertige, sehr sauber und hochwertige Ausstattung, sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Mitarbeiter. Schneller und perfekter Service im Restaurant Cloud Nine und in der Rooftopbar Twilight. Für uns der beste Service auf unserer Vietnam-Rundreise. Ein fine dining Erlebnis an Silvester der Extraklasse. Toller Pool auf dem Rooftop mit atemberaubenden Blick auf die Stadt. Bei Checkout wurde uns angeboten die Koffer kostenlos bis spät Abends einzulagern und Handtücher für eine Dusche bereitgelegt

review.rating: Truly amazing staff and great location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King (Không có Cửa sổ)
review.comment_positive:
Our stay at the La Siesta Premium Saigon Hotel was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment we arrived, we were greeted with warmth and hospitality that set the tone for the entire trip. The staff, without exception, went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of our stay was perfect.

One of the standout features of this hotel is undoubtedly the staff. Their genuine care and dedication to ensuring our comfort and satisfaction were evident at every turn. They anticipated our needs before we even realized them, and their willingness to go the extra mile made us feel truly valued as guests.

The cleanliness of the facilities was impeccable, reflecting the hotel's commitment to maintaining a high standard of hygiene and comfort. Every area, from the lobby to our room, was immaculately maintained, providing a welcoming environment to return to after a day of exploring the bustling streets of Ho Chi Minh City.

The location of the hotel was ideal, situated close to all the major attractions in the city. This convenience allowed us to make the most of our time in Ho Chi Minh City, easily exploring its vibrant culture, rich history, and delicious cuisine.

I must extend a special thank you to Ms. Mai Ngo, whose assistance and professionalism were instrumental in making our stay truly memorable. Her attention to detail and willingness to accommodate our requests made a significant difference and added an extra layer of enjoyment to our experience.

Overall, our time at the La Siesta Premium Saigon Hotel exceeded all expectations. We are immensely grateful to the entire staff for their exceptional service and for providing us with the best possible experience during our stay in Vietnam. We look forward to returning in the future and reliving the wonderful memories we created here.
review.comment_negative: There was nothing that me and my family did not like. Our time at La Siesta was one of the best hospitality experiences we’ve had!

review.rating: 5성이라 하기에는 아쉽고 가성비는 좋으나 최신식에 장점이 언제까지 갈지..
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: 가성비, 올해지어져서 새건물이라 깨끗하네요. 직원 친절, 바에 해피아워가 있어서 좋아요. 벤탄 가깝고 위치가 관광다니기 최적화네요. 조식 맛있어요.
review.comment_negative: 5성이라하기에 억지 구색 맞추기 느낌.. 체크인 하는데 거의 1시간 걸림 2시 20분 쯤 왔는데 3시 10분에 입실한듯함. 사람은 많은데 체크인은 엄청 걸림 걸린이유가 레이트 체크아웃 때문이라는데.. 뒷손님 피해갈거같으면 레이트 체크아웃을 하지 말아야지.. 엘레베이터가 2대라 혼잡시간에는 5분넘게 기다림. 호텔이 높지않아서 뷰가 별로.. 옆방에서 공사 드릴소리남 망치소리도.. 방음이 잘 안됨.. 밤에도 시끄러움. 냉장고는 켜놓지를 않아서 미지근... 냉장고 꺼있다니까 원래 안시원하다고 답변옴... 그게아니고 아예 안켜서 그래.. 코드를 안꽂음.. 새거라 직원들이 작동을 안시킨듯함.. 뭐 켜도 그닥 시원하지는 않았어요. 그리고 물 두병을 주는데 그냥 보틀 수돗물 담고 뚜껑만 닫아도 구별못할... 찝찝해서 못마심..그리고 침대옆에 식탁 있는데 의자가 한개... 2명 방인데 왜 의자가 한개인지?!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Quisiera expresar mi más sincera gratitud y admiración por la experiencia excepcional que tuvimos en el Hotel La Siesta Premium de Saigón. Desde el momento en que llegamos, nos sorprendimos la inigualable amabilidad y profesionalidad del personal. Cada miembro del equipo hizo todo lo posible para que nos sintiéramos como en casa, y el trato que recibimos superó todas nuestras expectativas. 

La ubicación del hotel es simplemente perfecta para explorar Ciudad Ho Chi Minh, con fácil acceso a los puntos de interés y atracciones. Las instalaciones del hotel son nuevas y extremadamente limpias, lo que agregó un toque de lujo a nuestra estancia. No pudimos haber pedido más. 

Quiero destacar especialmente la atención y hospitalidad de Dat Nguyen. Su cálida bienvenida y total disponibilidad para ayudarnos con cualquier consulta o solicitud que tuviéramos hecho que nuestra estancia fuera aún más especial. Sin duda, volveremos a este magnífico hotel cuando visitemos Ciudad Ho Chi Minh de nuevo. 

En resumen, el Hotel La Siesta Premium de Saigón es un verdadero tesoro en el corazón de la ciudad, altamente recomendable. Gracias por hacer que nuestra estancia sea inolvidable y un fuerte abrazo a Dat

review.rating: Het hotel is super luxe, heeft een mooie uitstraling en het personeel biedt een uitstekende service.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Het hotel is super nieuw en het personeel is fantastisch. We sloten onze vakantie in Vietnam af in dit hotel en het was echt een feestje. We kregen bij aankomst een heerlijk drankje en werden daarna naar onze kamer begeleid die erg luxe was. Op de elfde verdieping is een skybar waar we in de avond hebben genoten van heerlijke cocktails. Het ontbijt was ook ontzettend uitgebreid met bijvoorbeeld sushi. We vroegen aan een medewerkster of ze coconut coffee hadden bij het ontbijt wat er eigenlijk niet was maar ze ging dit speciaal voor ons maken. We hebben ook heerlijk genoten van het zwembad met mooi uitzicht. review.rating: A lovely property with incredible city views with a fab pool. Stars of the show were the staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: After staying at La Siesta in Hanoi, it was an easy choice to choose their sister property in HCMC. The property is quite beautiful, very clean and comfortable. The rooftop pool is stunning with amazing views of the city. The higher rooftop bar, an even better view. A good breakfast (however not as good as the one in Hanoi!). The staff are absolutely amazing. Super friendly, fun and couldn't do enough for you when asked. Great location with plenty of restaurants, cafes & bars around. The gym has enough equipment in it for a good workout with plenty of space if there's a few people using it and it's super clean.
review.comment_negative: With such high temperatures during the day, the rooftop pool area has very little shade. Definitely could do with some large umbrellas to make it an ideal area to chill out and enjoy the facilities. Also, perhaps a dedicated staff member to regularly service food and drinks by the pool area would be a great addition to the property and the overall experience for the guests. We were there over Luna New Year and had the opportunity to watch the fireworks from the rooftop bar however, it was quite expensive to purchase the package tickets to do so. It would have been lovely to have received even just a cheaper complimentary 'standing' ticket for the event as staying guests of the property.

review.rating: Great hotel for city trips, I can only recommend.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: We had a great stay at La Siesta. The staff were exceptionally kind and helpful, they assisted us with booking restaurants and transportation to our next location. The hotel is nicely decorated and rooms are very clean. We thought that soundproofing was quite good considering that the hotel is right in the middle of the city centre. The bedding is spacious and comfortable, and the rooms equipped with a tv and streaming services which was a great addition to help us regulate our jet lag.
review.comment_negative: We visited other hotels in Saigon and la Siesta was our favourite one. The only thing we didn’t like was the breakfast. It’s just a question of personal taste, as it still offers plenty of both western and Vietnamese options.

review.rating: Luxury and elegance away from home
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
If luxury and elegance had a home in Saigon, it would undoubtedly be La Siesta Premium. From the moment you step into its opulent lobby, you're greeted by an aura of sophistication and warmth that sets the tone for an unforgettable stay.
The attention to detail in every aspect of the hotel is unparalleled. The rooms are not just accommodation; they are sanctuaries of comfort and style, adorned with tasteful decor and equipped with every modern amenity one could desire. The plush bedding ensures a good night's sleep. 
The breakfast choice is varied and excellent, their home made yoghurt and panna cotta (ummmm to die for 😋).
But what truly sets La Siesta apart is their exceptional service. The staff, embodying the renowned Vietnamese hospitality, goes above and beyond to cater for guests needs with a genuine warmth and efficiency.
Nestled in the heart of HCMC it offers perfect blend of tranquillity and accessibility. Step outside and you're immersed in a vibrant energy of the city with it's bustling markets, historical landmarks and cultural treasures to be explored.
In conclusion, La Siesta is not just a hotel, it's an experience. Weather for business or leisure, a stay in this boutique establishment is sure to leave you with cherished memories that will last a lifetime.

The hotel staff could not do enough for us, they were very helpful. There is a small pool area, which is very well done althoug compact and a great terrace skybar. Just a word for those booking a half day Saigon excursion, then it would be cheaper to get the big red bus (at 200,000 dong) that goes to exactly the same sites as the tours. review.comment_positive:
The best thing of my repeat stay here was the staff especially Lieu who went out o his way to make sure our stay was a memorable one as it was our anniversary. We received a lovely cake and a voucher for welcome drinks. There was also a rose petal and swans made from towels.

House keeping was excellent as well as reception.The Spa was very relaxing and the huge give standards in all parts of the hotel was great except for one small incident during breakfast,
review.comment_negative:
This is a small point but the kitchen staff as in the chefs should all be using gloves when preparing food. As I was sat in front of the glass over looking the kitchen, it was disconcerting to see a chef who who preparing the breakfast Pho picking his nose. I very much hope he washed his hands before preparing food,

Other than that the breakfast spread was very tasty, but the food could be hotter in temperature.

review.rating: Modernt, rent och snyggt. Bra läge.
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Thông Nhau Cho 4 Người
review.comment_positive: Nytt hotell, rent och fräscht. Bra takpool som duger bra även för att simma ett par längder. Trots att hotellet var fullbokat upplevde vi inte att det var mycket folk vid pool eller gym. Rummen stora och luftiga (hade executive rum med fönster). Takbaren var 2 våningar och hade mycket fin utsikt och bra service. Receptionen bra och effektiv.
review.comment_negative:
Frukostrestaurangen upplevdes något trång och med lite hög ljudnivå men helt ok. 
Enda misstaget från hotellets sida var när de bokade körning till vår nästa destination, Mui Ne. Bad om stor, modern bil men det kom en ganska liten och sliten taxi där inte alla säkerhetsbälten fungerade, vilket inte är ok särskilt givet att de kör aggressivt och, enligt vårt synsätt, utan att följa standard trafikregler. Efter ett tag fick vi åka i hotellets bil men chauffören körde mycket illa oavsett måttstock och hela bilresan blev en mycket nervös upplevelse.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn (Không có Cửa sổ)
review.comment_positive: 아침식사 종류도 다양하고 맛있었어요. 다만, 식사 장소가 좁아서 9시 정도에 가니 너무 몰리는 느낌이 있었습니다. 그 외에는 1군 도심지에 위치, 호텔 직원들의 서비스 모두 완벽했습니다. 호텔 위치 자체가 도심 지역 중앙에 있는지라 바로 앞 도로는 번잡한 느낌이 있긴 하지만 근처에 멋진 바도 많고, 현지 분위기도 느낄 수 있었어요. 위치 상 일정 끝내고 잠시 쉬었다가 근처 한 잔하러 가기에 좋았습니다. 11층에 위치한 수영장, 루프탑 바에서도 호치민의 도시적 분위기를 느낄 수 있었어요. 지하에 있는 헬스장에서도 조용히 가벼운 운동할 수 있었습니다. 체크아웃 날 짐 맡기고 돌아와 저녁에 택시타러 갈 때, 직원분들께서 나와 작별 인사해주셔서 호치민 여행이 좋은 기억으로 남았습니다.
review.comment_negative: 창문 없는 방에 숙박했는데, 환기나 조명 측면에서 창문이 얼마나 중요한지 새삼 느끼게 되었네요. 화장실 문이 슬라이징 도어라 꽉 고정되지 않았는데 이건 요청하니 바로 고쳐주셨어요. 호텔 자체는 매우 조용하지만 로비 자체가 크지 않아서 체크인/아웃 시간에는 혼란스러운 느낌 이 있습니다. 하지만 담당 직원이 마킹을 잘 해주시고, 적극적으로 도와주셨어요.

review.rating: Very enjoyable stay in vibrant Saigon, the hotel catered to all our needs and made our stay in Saigon a very happy one.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Its a newly opened property and everything is new and shiny. All the staff were terrific, very welcoming genuinely friendly and everyone went out of their way to help. 
A couple of the Front desk team were exceptional in helping with our needs in sourcing a local tailor and with our  packing requirements. 
The location is in the vibrant part of the city, close to the Central market with lots of good cafes and restaurants.
review.comment_negative: Once the property has more time to iron out small details since their opening, the hotel will be able to provide guests a great experience.

review.rating: Beautiful boutique hotel in the center of HCM!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The location in district 1 is the best! You can walk to all main sights, shopping area and night life area. The hotel has a good size, the pool on the rooftop is very nice and the staff was always super helpful and friendly. It was also very clean! Breakfast was good, they make fresh eggs in the style you like :)
review.comment_negative: The rooftop bar was a bit empty in the evening - but it was still very nice to have a drink.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
- Everyone at this hotel was very professional and helpful. Check in & check out was super smooth, the receptionist spoke very good English. They never tried to sell any sightseeing tours or transportations, so we felt that their help and advice were genuine. They didn't ask us to leave 10 star review either, which we often felt disappointed in other hotels in Vietnam. They even offered us to use a shower after check-out, when we mentioned our midnight flight! The whole vibe was very very accommodating. 

- Breakfast. The selection of food may not be the most spectacular, but every piece tasted super good. I felt this is much better than having a wide range of food with so-so taste. We especially liked their home made yogurt and panna cotta!
review.comment_negative: - Our room on 2nd floor was not completely sound proof, and we could hear noise from street at night. The noise was loud enough that I felt a bit difficult to sleep in. If you are sensitive, I would recommend asking specifically for a quiet room.

review.comment_positive: Von der Ankunft bis zum Abschied war alles perfekt. Das Personal war sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit und professionell ausgebildet. Unser Zimmer hatte eine gute Größe, es war sehr sauber und die Betten waren super bequem. Wir waren im 8. Stock und hatten das Zimmer zur Straße, trotzdem war es unserer Meinung nach sehr ruhig im Zimmer. Wir haben den Verkehr kaum gehört. Die Lage ist top - man kann alles sehr gut zu Fuß erkunden. Besonders gefallen hat uns auch die Rooftop Bar Twilight. Der Ausblick ist wirklich schön und die Getränke auch. Das Restaurant ist vergleichsweise teuer, aber dafür bekommt man auch ausgezeichnete Qualität. Die Pho mit Wagyu Beef waren richtig gut.

review.comment_positive: Check-In war sehr gut mit Welcome Drink, Obst, etc. Zimmer wurde nochmal durchgecheckt bevor wir reindurften. Trotzdem funktionierte der Safe nicht. Zimmer waren sauber.
review.comment_negative:
Keine schöne Aussicht, was wohl bei dieser Stadt normal ist. Eier Zubereitung beim Frühstück dauert viel zu lange. Wir hatten einmal Eier bestellt und als nach 20 Minuten noch immer nichts serviert wurde mussten wir leider gehen, da wir auf einen Ausflug mussten. Sehr schade, da nicht mal viel Leute beim Frühstück waren.
Wir haben zwei Mal gefragt, um einen Late check-out zu bekommen. Leider ist nie jemand auf uns zurück gekommen, was ziemlich frustrierend war für uns. Es ist kein Problem, wenn es nicht möglich ist, eine Antwort wäre jedoch das Mindeste. Wir haben dann wie geplant um 12:00 Uhr ausgecheckt und der Manager hat uns sehr unfreundlich gleich gesagt "Please check out", was wir ja auch wollten. Unsere Koffer konnten wir da stehen lassen. Wir wurden gebeten kurz zu warten, damit sie die Zimmer checken konnten. Wir haben gewartet und nach 20 Minuten hatten wir genug und haben nachgefragt. Sie meinten sie müssten unser Zimmer noch checken. Wir meinten dann, dass wir ja eh wieder kommen für die Koffer, das war dann in Ordnung. Für mich leider kein angepasster Service für ein solches Hotel. Enttäuschend für uns.

review.comment_positive: La Siësta is een prachtig hotel. Voor we aankwamen had ik al app contact met Liem. Hij regelde een auto voor ons bij het vliegveld. Verder tijdens ons verblijf kwam hij altijd even vragen of hij iets voor ons kon doen. Bij aankomst werden we zo ongelofelijk gastvrij ontvangen door Huong. Zij was zo lief. Altijd tijd voor een praatje. Wilde alles regelen voor ons. Net als de rest van het team. We voelden ons net een familielid. Nog nooit zo warm ontvangen. De laatste nacht mochten we zelfs doorbrengen in hun grootste mooiste kamer. Echt prachtig. Bij afscheid kregen we zelfs nog een cadeautje. Nog nooit meegemaakt. De plek is perfect. Alles op loopafstand. De Ben Thanh market om de hoek. Het prachtige zwembad, skybar en de prachtige kamers. Wij komen beslist terug.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Our check-in host, Dat was very good and knowledgeable. 
The hotel is 8 months old, and is very modern.
It is a true boutique hotel in the heart of district 1.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Жили в отеле в ноябре несколько дней, отель великолепный, новый , чистый с прекрасным обслуживанием. Встреча, приветственный напиток, сопровождение багажа - все соответствует 5* отелю. Любой вопрос на рецепшн персонал очень помогал решать.
Номер достаточно просторный, было меню подушек ( не понадобилось - т.к. кровать, матрас и подушки были отличные), Очень понравился бар на верхнем этаже - с прекрасным видом на город. Завтраки хорошие,  всем хватает выбора - и азиатское меню и европейское - всем найдется выбор,вкусный кофе.
review.comment_negative: На завтраке сырная тарелка была не очень красивая - сыр засохший и обветренный, я бы сделала хранение в закрытой емкости на холоде. Так же в баре на верхнем этаже очень долгое обслуживание - мы ждали свои напитки около 20 мин !

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Buffet Breakfast was excellent with loads of variety however would've been nice to see more Vietnamese food on offer. Still overall, the rooftop bar, pool were fabulous
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: toller Ausgangspunkt für einen City Trip nach Ho Chi Minh City
review.room_type: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King (Không có Cửa sổ)
review.comment_positive: Neu eröffnetes Hotel mitten im District 1 von Ho Chi Minh City. Viele Restaurants, Läden, Kosmetik- und Massage-Salons sowie der bekannte Ben-Thanh-Markt fußläufig erreichbar. Personal sehr aufmerksam und hilfsbereit. Sehr gutes SPA, wir hatten dort 2 Massagen gebucht. Auch das Restaurant sowie die Bar sind zu empfehlen.
review.comment_negative: Badezimmer etwas klein mit wenig Abstellfläche und leider keine Haken oder Halter für die Handtücher. Portionen im Restaurant etwas zu klein für unseren Geschmack.

review.rating: A fabulous place to stay in the City with the most friendly and helpful staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is in an excellent position so we could walk to all the shops, restaurants and museums.  It was beautifully decorated,  very clean  and the beds were so comfortable. We ate breakfast, lunch and had cocktails on the roof bar and all were fabulous.
The staff were ALL exceptional. Trinh 👍(Taylor) helped us at check in and  kept in touch throughout our trip, booking the Secret Garden restaurant for us ( great place to eat on the roof garden). She also booked our speed boat tour to the Cu Chi tunnels which was a highlight of our trip, special thanks to Hung who was so funny and informative.  All the staff went out of way to ensure that we were looked after and came away with wonderful memories on Ho Chi Min City and we will be back 😁 Thank you!

Breakfast is average, and the seats are  limited.  

The swimming pool is small.

Gym is poor, small, and located in no windows basement.

Phòng Executive Thông Nhau Cho 4 Người
review.comment_positive: The staff were lovely and friendly

review.room_type: Suite Junior
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was only open less than 2 weeks. But the staff had the guidance of very experienced managers so the service was flawless. 
The Reception was friendly and also very helpful. They helped us to finding places provided a map with the welcome drink and Liem even helped us book a Mekong Delta tour with an excellent guide.
We watched the fireworks at their roof top bar which made this whole trip so memorable.
We had booked a junior suite so had the luxury of a balcony swing. Tho we were on the main drag when the windows were closed it was quiet.
Already thinking of going back to explore more of Saigon. And staying here
review.comment_negative: The bathtub in the room didn't have very hot water but the shower was great.
